body:
Hey guys!

Well guys. Recently I decided to leave Avicus. I did, but I came back. It's time to tell you that I am in situation of choosing if I should stay on Avicus or not. I have alot of reasons. One of my reasons is staff. I don't mean that all staff members on this server are stupid, unfriendly,... Sorry for swearing. I know a lot of staff members and they're friendly, but today I actually argued with 3 staff members. Imo they are not very useful and friendly. Staff members who tried to help me with my report today, forget about this, you guys are okay! Second reason is: rude players. Help me decide if I should stay or not.

IK, my English sucks.

title: Don't know...

replies.body:
I'm Sorry that your report was denied.

If you read this thread before posting. You would know that you needed video evidence when reporting this type of punishment. https://avicus.net/forums/fe28a294c

Specifically this part of the thread.
"Team Griefing/Spleefing:
  • Team Griefing includes, but is not limited to, blocking spawn, breaking in-use crafting tables, and purposely spamming blocks to disrupt gameplay.
  • Team Griefing evidence can be in the form of multiple screenshots or video.
  • When reporting a player for team spleefing, the death message “has been spleefed by” is not enough evidence for staff to punish a player."

replies.body: Thanks, but it's not reason of my problem.

replies.body:
If you have a concern with a person on the staff team, talk to me on Skype: live:j420ac10k

There's no need to discuss it publicly.
